heroTagline: Practicing, Promoting, and Preserving Jain Values
aboutDescription: The Jain Society of San Diego is a 501(c)(3) non-profit religious organization to pursue a goal of practicing, promoting, and preserving the Jain religion. It is governed by a constitution and managed by a Trustee Committee and an Executive Committee consisting of President, Vice President, Secretary, Treasurer, who are elected by the Jain Center members for a term of two years.
aboutQuote: "Ahimsa paramo dharma" - Non-violence is the highest dharma
missionPoints: Practice and promote Jain principles in daily life
Preserve Jain culture and traditions for future generations
Foster community unity and spiritual growth
Educate youth through our Pathshala program

announcements.title: Paryushan Mahaparva 2025
announcements.content: Join us for the most sacred Jain festival from August 15-22, 2025. Daily prayers, spiritual discourses, and community meals will be organized.

announcements.title: Youth Pathshala Registration Open
announcements.content: Registration is now open for our Youth Pathshala program. Classes start September 1st. Ages 5-16 welcome.

announcements.title: Monthly Community Potluck
announcements.content: Join our monthly community potluck dinner. Bring a vegetarian dish to share and enjoy fellowship with fellow community members.

feedbackHeading: Get in touch for any questions or leave us a feedback
feedbackSubHeading: We'd love to hear from you! Share your thoughts, suggestions, or questions with us.
ctaTagline: Be part of our growing family and help preserve Jain traditions
